name: Gun Slugs
description:
Early Access (Beta 1)

Feedback welcome. Looking for any bugs you can find! :)

GunSlugs is a Sega Genesis / Megadrive conversion of the hugely popular run'n'gun  game by OrangePixel.

To play in a browser, download the file, and upload it to https://www.emulatrix.com/

Or use any existing Sega Genesis emulator, like Blastem or Gens.

It is completely re-written from scratch in 68000 assembler.
